keywords_explanation_array: "Valency is a whole number that represents the ability of an atom or a group of atoms to combine with other atoms or groups of atoms.","Atom is the smallest component of an element.","Ions are charged atoms which have either gained or lost electrons.","Negatively charged sub atomic particle that revolves around the nucleus.","A covalent bond is the bond formed by sharing of electrons.","Ionic bond is a bond formed by donation of electrons.","The octet rule states that elements loose or gain electrons to attain an electron configuration of the nearest noble gas."
